column4: i've got what appears to be a copy-protected audio CD: when i put it in the drive, it spins for a moment and spits it back out. is there any way to force it to mount, or to see an error message at least?
my PC does that with bad CD's
the CD plays fine in my stereo, so i guess it's intentionally done for copy protection? i've got two here that don't work, but all my others seem fine
